A new way to donate to charity

Saving the world one milestone at a time

  • Giveth
Learn More

We built the Giveth network on the transparency and
accountability provided by Ethereum

Ethereum is a blockchain technology that allows you to give valuable transactions
to help others achieve milestones that matter to both of you.

  • Lorem
  • Ipsum
  • Dolor

Have a say
in where your donations go

Unlike donating to a company, you can choose which specific milestone your donations are used for.

Achieve results
or your donations go back to you

Unlike donating to a company, milestones must be completed before donations are released. Miletsone completions are confirmed by a simple review process.

Saving the world together

We are completely opensource
and we work with a lot of great parntners in the blockchain eco-system.
